author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
Special buses

for Pongal

The Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC), Coimbatore Division, is operating 665 special trips to various destinations across the State for Pongal. The service will continue till January 14. In includes a total of 238 trips from Coimbatore, 231 from Tirupur, 142 from Erode and 54 from The Nilgiris.

The TNSTC will also operate special buses after Pongal from January 17. The return services will continue till there is demand, a senior TNSTC official said.

Helmet awareness rally taken out

Nearly 500 college students took part in the helmet awareness rally that was organised by the Transport Department at Kovaipudur here on Wednesday. Driving schools in the city also took part in the rally in which a bus was flagged off. On Tuesday, a photo exhibition on road safety was inaugurated at the Gandhipuram Central Bus Stand by Deputy Commissioner (Traffic) for Coimbatore City Police, T. Sivakumar. More than 250 college students participated in the elocution, drawing and essay writing competitions organised by the transport department, on Tuesday.
title: Briefly (Two Items)
